title: Average per game attendance English Premier League 2018/19
summary: In general Average attendance has rose over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2016/17 to 2017/18.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016/17 and 2017/18.
The highest Average attendance, of value 38495.0 was reached at Year 2017/18
Minimum Average attendance about 35838.0 was reached at Year 2016/17
